description: Attitude of sincerity, digging out heart and lungs.

examples.chinese: 身边掏心掏肺相处的朋友都是认识比较久的
examples.translation: Friends around me who I treat wholeheartedly are generally long-time acquaintances

examples.chinese: 不要见谁都掏心掏肺,至交就那么几个
examples.translation: Don't pour your heart out to everyone, close friends are few
